Introduction
------------

This project is an engineering school project of la Prepa des INP Nancy. |br|
5 students own this project:

* Alexis le Meur
* Etienne Tachouzin
* Paul Bedrossian
* Guillaume Hisleur
* Paul Martin

About the project
-----------------
Phasor noise is a package providing a generator of procedural phasor noise. |br|
It claims a graphical interface to visualize how parameters change the noise created.
